name: daily-planner
title: Daily Planner
description: Take control of your time: time block your day, track time spent on each task, and analyze how you're spending your time compared to your planned time blocks. Stay focused with a running timer and task title displayed in the menu bar.
author: benyn

commands.name: block-time
commands.title: Block Time for To-Dos
commands.description: Schedule focus time blocks for tasks from your favorite to-do list apps such as Reminders, Things, or Todoist.

preferences.name: defaultBlockDuration
preferences.title: Default Time Block Duration
preferences.description: Default length for calendar events created for to-dos

preferences.name: workingHoursStart
preferences.title: Working Hours Start Time
preferences.description: The earliest time of the day at which time block scheduling suggestions should start

preferences.name: workingHoursEnd
preferences.title: Working Hours End Time
preferences.description: The latest time of the day at which time block scheduling suggestions should end

preferences.name: alarmOffset
preferences.title: Time Block Alert Timing
preferences.description: Your preferred timing for alerts about upcoming time blocks

preferences.name: taskBlockName
preferences.title: Task Block Name
preferences.description: Default title for a calendar event representing a block of time set aside for multiple small tasks

preferences.name: breakBlockName
preferences.title: Break Block Name
preferences.description: Default title for a calendar event representing a block of time set aside for relaxation

preferences.name: isReschedulingOnTimeblocking
preferences.label: Update Start/Due Date on Time Blocking
preferences.description: If a task is time-blocked for a date earlier than its start date (Reminders/Things) or due date (Todoist), update the start/due date to the time-blocked date.

commands.name: track-time
commands.title: Track Time for To-Dos
commands.description: Track time spent on tasks using Toggl or Clockify, or directly on your calendar. Compare it against the time blocks you've budgeted for each task.

preferences.name: isReschedulingOnTimeTracking
preferences.label: Update Start/Due Date on Timer Start
preferences.description: If a timer for a task is started earlier than its start date (Reminders/Things) or due date (Todoist), update the start/due date to the current date.

commands.name: generate-productivity-reports
commands.title: Generate Productivity Reports
commands.description: Build customizable blocked and tracked time reports to identify productivity patterns and improve workflow over time. See how much time you're spending on meetings and other events.

preferences.name: excludeWeekends
preferences.label: Exclude Weekends
preferences.description: Exclude to-dos, calendar events, and time entries occurring on Saturdays and Sundays from the generated reports.

preferences.name: showUnscheduledOpenTodos
preferences.label: Show Unscheduled & Open To-Dos
preferences.description: Include incomplete to-dos that have not been assigned a time block or tracked in the generated reports.

preferences.name: groupBySpontaneity
preferences.label: Group To-Dos by Spontaneity
preferences.description: Group to-dos based on whether they were completed as scheduled (with assigned time/task blocks) or spontaneously (without assigned time/task blocks).

commands.name: show-menu-bar-timer
commands.title: Show Menu Bar Timer
commands.description: Display a running timer and the associated task title in the macOS Menu Bar for quick reference and to stay focused on your current task.

preferences.name: hideTimerTitle
preferences.label: Hide Timer Title
preferences.description: Display the timer in the menu bar without the title.

commands.name: split-screen
commands.title: Split Screen To-Dos and Calendar
commands.description: Arrange your primary to-do app (Reminders, Things, or Todoist) and macOS Calendar app side by side for a convenient view of your daily tasks and scheduled events. Relaunching the command restores the to-do app and Calendar window positions and sizes to their original state.

preferences.name: splitRatio
preferences.title: Window Size Ratio
preferences.description: Specify the ratio between the widths of the to-do app window and the calendar window when displayed side by side.

preferences.name: primaryTodoSource
preferences.title: Primary To-Do List App
preferences.description: Choose your primary to-do list app. New tasks will be created in this app, and its keyboard shortcut scheme will be used.

preferences.name: secondaryTodoSource
preferences.title: Additional To-Do List App
preferences.description: Select an additional to-do list app to source tasks from, alongside your primary app.

preferences.name: tertiaryTodoSource
preferences.title: Additional To-Do List App
preferences.description: Select an additional to-do list app to source tasks from, alongside your primary app.

preferences.name: todoistAPIToken
preferences.title: Todoist API Token
preferences.description: If you chose Todoist as one of your to-do list apps, copy and paste your API token here. You can find it in Todoist Settings > Integrations > Developer.

preferences.name: blockCalendar
preferences.title: Time Block Calendar
preferences.description: Enter the name of the calendar where your time blocks should be placed. If this calendar doesn't exist, you'll see an option to create it when launching a command.

preferences.name: eventCalendars
preferences.title: Event Calendar Names
preferences.description: Enter the names of calendars, separated by commas without leading or trailing spaces, containing events that should not conflict with your time blocks.

preferences.name: timeTrackingApp
preferences.title: Time Tracking App
preferences.description: Choose the time tracking app to use for logging time entries.

preferences.name: timeEntryCalendar
preferences.title: Calendar for Time Tracking
preferences.description: If you selected Calendar as your Time Tracking App, enter the name of the calendar where your time entries should be placed. If this calendar doesn't exist, you'll see an option to create it when launching a command.

preferences.name: timeTrackerAPIKey
preferences.title: Time Tracking App API Key
preferences.description: If you selected Toggl or Clockify as your Time Tracking App, enter the API key to access your data stored in the chosen app.

preferences.name: isSyncingProjects
preferences.label: Sync projects
preferences.description: If you selected Toggl or Clockify as your Time Tracking App, enable this option to sync projects from your to-do list app to your time tracking app (one-way sync).

preferences.name: isSyncingTags
preferences.label: Sync tags
preferences.description: If you selected Toggl or Clockify as your Time Tracking App, enable this option to sync tags from your to-do list app to your time tracking app (one-way sync).
